website_summaries.verdict: Basketball shoe enthusiasts can take a break from their favorite athletic shoe with the Nike LeBron XIII Lifestyle. The mix of materials and designs gives the shoe a good quality. The cushioned midsole is comfortable enough for daily casual wear. Since it’s from LeBron James’ signature line with Nike, the shoe comes at a slightly expensive price.
pros: Most Nike LeBron XIII Lifestyle owners liked the appearance of the shoe
A wearer was satisfied with the quality of these kicks
It has a cushioned midsole that provides comfort
The rubber outsole has a herringbone tread for traction
A handful noted that it is a versatile shoe worthy of LeBron’s multi-faceted game
cons: A reviewer commented that the Nike LeBron XIII Lifestyle is hard
A Nike LeBron XIII Lifestyle owner gave it a one-star rating because it felt uncomfortable
The LeBron XIII Lifestyle is a slightly expensive shoe

customer_reviews.title: I finally came to conclusion that it was not fair at least to acknowledge the hard work of packing my orders nicely and securely
customer_reviews.text: After many monthsssss of not writing a review, I finally came to conclusion that it was not fair at least to acknowledge the hard work of packing my orders nicely and securely by AMAZON STAFF. Few items were packed really well. This item was excellently packed. It had bubble packs in the box to protect the shoes from inside damage. LEBRON SHOES ARE EXPENSIVE IN THE MALL. AMAZON MADE THEM VERY AFFORDABLE. INDEED!!!. It is true to size and very comfortable to wear. The shoes has a very UNIQUE DESIGN. It has tiny tiny rubber spikes in front and back. AWESOME!!!. Burgundy made the shoes a scene stealer. I am very happy and very satisfied with my purchase. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cyril F. Rios

customer_reviews.title: Solid inexpensive all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got half a size bigger and it fits perfect. These were $50, and I like that they're flat enough and sturdy enough on the bottom to deadlift and squat at the gym with but I'm also prepared in case a spontaneous basketball game breaks out, and light enough that I can use them as a running shoe.
